name: rolldown (shrekjuice)
description:
Mini-roguelike puzzle game. Arrow keys to move, space to use items.

num(dots) > num(eyes) = damage!

Made in 48h for the GMTK Game Jam 2022. If you enjoyed the game, please leave a rating on the jam page! I will love you forever.

-------------------------------------------------

"rolldown" uses art by Kenney, a font by Daniel Linssen, and SFX by Kenney and Shapeforms audio. Programming, music, and additional art by me.
